reviews.text: I visited during a weekday lunchtime and decided to order the beef noodles. The service was impressively fast, and my meal arrived in no time. The noodles were quite enjoyable, with the beef slices tender and flavorful, although the separate broth have had a bit more depth. Overall, the dish was satisfying but not outstanding. The portion size was quite small for the price of $5.00, making it a decent option for a quick, convenient lunch. The restaurant was moderately busy but still had a free seating arrangement.
